Algorithm

  • 1. Check if file cache exist
  • -yes then load the file
  • -No create new file
  • 2. Check if cache expire
  • 3. Check if page is in ignorelist

    • Function to use

  • ob_start()
  • ob_get_content()
  • ob_end_flush()
  • fopen()
  • fclose()
  • fwrite()
  • readfile()
  • file_exists()
